General.Name: Shanxi Sanwei Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanxi Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd. manages and operates expressways. The company manages, maintains, and invests in highways, bridges, and tunnel infrastructure, as well as provides consulting services. It also provides various services, including capital market, toll management, tunnel management, road maintenance and administration management, safety emergency management, overrun management, information monitoring, etc. The company was formerly known as Shanxi Sanwei Group Co.,Ltd. Shanxi Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Taiyuan, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: 12th Floor, Huaneng Technology Building, Taiyuan, China, 030006

1.Name: Mr. Xi  Ji
1.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
